title: President Donald J. Trump Is Protecting Healthcare Benefits for American Citizens – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Healthcare	

Issued on:
October 4, 2019
To protect benefits for American citizens, immigrants must be financially self-sufficient.
						President Donald J. Trump					ENSURING A STRONG HEALTHCARE SYSTEM: President Donald J. Trump wants to ensure immigrants do not financially burden our healthcare system.PROTECTING AMERICAN TAXPAYERS: Admitting large numbers of immigrants who cannot pay for their own healthcare puts a burden on our taxpayers and healthcare system.  PROMOTING SELF-SUFFICIENCY: President Trump is working to promote immigrant self-sufficiency and protect American taxpayers.
